item.title: The Monday Report – Boxing Day “Dead Health Potion” Edition
item.description: Hello! This is quite possibly the last post Iâ€™ll do in 2011, so lets make with the goods! This past week Iâ€™ve continued working on the demake of my primary project. If you checked out the Ludum Dare prototype, the core mechanics have dramatically improved since then (about 4 days ago). I actually keep a relatively detailed development Journal while working, but a lot of stuff is either very minor, subtle, contains spoilers, or is simply just too long to post.

item.title: Ludum Dare Prototyping
item.description: I wont talk too much about how Ludum Dare itself went, as Iâ€™ve already done that over here. But in addition to running the event, I participated for the first time in a long time. The theme was â€œAloneâ€œ, which I find funny given the title of my game. Could I not enter? ðŸ˜‰ About a week before Ludum Dare, I started toying with the idea of creating a demake of my game.
